name: Futzim
description:
Futzim is simple football manager game made with Godot!

Updates

0.1.1 (19/01/20): 

  • 1-3 to change game speed
  • English language
  • MacOS and Linux binaries
  • More events (such as yellow/red cards)
  • Small panel showing some of the players' stats when you hover over its button in the Manage menu
